CustomField.formula: IF(Text(AcctSeed__Billing_Frequency__c)="Monthly", AcctSeed__Total__c * 12, IF(Text(AcctSeed__Billing_Frequency__c)="Semi-Annual", AcctSeed__Total__c * 2, IF(Text(AcctSeed__Billing_Frequency__c)="Quarterly", AcctSeed__Total__c * 4, IF(Text(AcctSeed__Billing_Frequency__c)="Weekly", AcctSeed__Total__c * 52, IF(Text(AcctSeed__Billing_Frequency__c)="Bi-weekly", AcctSeed__Total__c * 26, AcctSeed__Total__c )))))
CustomField.label: Annual Amount
